session_items.Title: Welcome to Rocket.Chat GSOC Demo Day 2023!
session_items.Description: Let's welcome all participants, contributors and Mentor!
session_items.Speaker: Gabriel Engel & Rodrigo Nascimento

session_items.Title: Scaled Botpress Connector
session_items.Description: Join us for an exciting session where we will showcase the new botpress connector app for Rocket.Chat, an open-source chat platform that lets you create your own chatbots and integrations.
session_items.Speaker: Shubham Bhardwaj
Vinayak Sharma
session_items.Title: Whiteboard Integration
session_items.Description: Do you want to enhance your team collaboration with whiteboards and visual drawing? If so, you will love our new Rocket.Chat App that integrates Markboard, an open-source whiteboard created by a Rocket.Chat GSoC alumni. Markboard is built on the same technology stack as Rocket.Chat, and it allows you to create and share concepts, diagrams, sketches, and more with your team members. In this session, you will learn how to install and use the app, how it extends Rocket.Chat’s team collaboration features, and what challenges and outcomes the project faced. You will also see some live demos of the app in action and interact with our project team. Don’t miss this opportunity to discover how Markboard can transform your team collaboration with Rocket.Chat!

session_items.Speaker: Vivek Srivastava
session_items.Title: UiKit Playground 2.0
session_items.Description: Are you interested in creating new UI elements for Rocket.Chat, the open-source chat platform? If so, you will enjoy our session on Rocket.Chat UiKit, the protocol/tool that allows Rocket.Chat apps to add new web and mobile elements to the current UI. Rocket.Chat UiKit is a powerful and flexible way to customize and extend your chat experience with Rocket.Chat. In this session, you will learn how to use the UiKit Playground, a tool that lets you visualize and test the main functionalities of the UiKit. You will also learn how to add other features that improve and encourage the development of apps, such as templates, workflows simulation, connecting to a workspace, and sending/sharing the prototypes through Rocket.Chat. You will also see some live demos of the UiKit in action and interact with our project team. Don’t miss this opportunity to discover how Rocket.Chat UiKit can help you create amazing UI elements for your chat apps!

session_items.Speaker: Nabhag Motivaras
session_items.Title: Integrate Notion via RC App
session_items.Description: In this presentation, you'll gain insights into the development of a unique integration that allows for seamless interaction between Rocket.Chat and Notion. Imagine the power of creating pages and receiving notifications, all without stepping out of Rocket.Chat's ecosystem.

session_items.Speaker: Mohd Sameer
session_items.Title: Miro App for Rocket.Chat
session_items.Description: Unleash your creativity as we explore the synergy between Rocket.Chat and Miro, opening doors to efficient idea sharing and visual collaboration. Don't miss out on this opportunity to witness firsthand how the Miro App transforms the way you work together. Join us and embark on a journey to boost productivity and engagement in your collaborative projects.

session_items.Speaker: Aditya Singh
session_items.Title: Guided RC Code Walkthrough and Tutorial
session_items.Description: This project Project uses VS code's Code tour extension which helps us to create step by step tours Let's say if developer wants to know how a message is sent, they may install the extension and start the tour and the tour would traverse through multiple files and folders and guide users how things are happening.

session_items.Speaker: Disha Bhardwaj
session_items.Title: Introduce Captcha to Livechat Widget
session_items.Mentor: Murtaza Patrawala, Renato Becker, Kevin Aleman
session_items.Description: Join us for a quick session unveiling the triumph against spam messages. Witness how RocketChat's live chat widget now stands fortified with CAPTCHA, ensuring human interactions and elevating user experience. Say goodbye to spam and hello to secure and seamless conversations. Be there to witness the evolution!

session_items.Speaker: M. Palanikannan
session_items.Title: Google Summer of Code Community Hub
session_items.Description: Join us for an exciting session, presenting the Full-stack components, which can be leveraged to build a scalable, flexible GSoC Community Hub

session_items.Title: Welcome to Rocket.Chat GSOC Alumni Summit 2024!
session_items.Description: Let's welcome all participants, contributors and Mentor!
session_items.Speaker: Gabriel Engel & Sing Li & Rodrigo Nascimento

session_items.Title: Tips for creating a winning proposal!
session_items.Description: Ever wondered what's so special in an accepted proposal? Want to know what mentors look for in your proposal? Join in this fun conversation by a past GSoCer and a current GSoC mentor of two projects to know all you can do to make your proposal shine among others.
session_items.Speaker: Samad Khan

session_items.Title: Impact of AI on Software developer role
session_items.Description: Navigating the New Code Era: AI’s Role in Redefining Software Development” Unpack the transformative effects of artificial intelligence on the software development industry. This session will explore how AI is revolutionizing the developer’s toolkit, automating routine tasks, and fostering innovative problem-solving strategies. Discover how AI is not just a tool but a partner in coding, pushing the boundaries of what developers can achieve and shaping the future of software creation. Join us to understand the evolving role of the software developer in an AI-integrated world.
session_items.Speaker: Murtaza Patrawala

session_items.Title: Post-GSoC Opportunities
session_items.Description: Discover the horizon of possibilities that await you after Google Summer of Code in ‘Post-GSoC Opportunities.’ In this talk, seasoned GSoC alumni will share their experiences transitioning from the program to professional roles and continued open-source contributions. Gain insights into how the skills and networks developed during GSoC can open doors to new opportunities and set the stage for a successful career in tech.
session_items.Speaker: Karan Bedi

session_items.Title: Break - Networking
session_items.Description: Time to chat with other participants and mentors
session_items.Speaker: Community

session_items.Title: Controlling Project Setbacks for Revival to Success by Embracing Feedback
session_items.Description: This talk will focus on potential red flags and spotting problems early in a project, and how to avoid them. It will also cover managing project setbacks midway by embracing feedback to ensure that your project is successful.
session_items.Speaker: Nabhag Motivaras

session_items.Title: Inaugural Journeys: GSoC Alumni Reflect on First-Time Experiences
session_items.Description: Join us at the GSoC Alumni Summit for an inspiring session titled 'Inaugural Journeys,' where seasoned GSoC alumni will share their first-time experiences. Discover the challenges they overcame, the knowledge they gained, and the paths they paved in the world of open-source development. This is a perfect opportunity for new contributors to learn, connect, and get inspired to embark on their own GSoC adventures.
session_items.Speaker: Ezequiel Reis

session_items.Title: Post-GSoC Opportunities
session_items.Description: Discover the horizon of possibilities that await you after Google Summer of Code in ‘Post-GSoC Opportunities.’ In this talk, seasoned GSoC alumni will share their experiences transitioning from the program to professional roles and continued open-source contributions. Gain insights into how the skills and networks developed during GSoC can open doors to new opportunities and set the stage for a successful career in tech.
session_items.Speaker: Abhinav Kumar

session_items.Title: The Journey from aspirant to Alumni
session_items.Description: This talk will focus on the journey of a GSoC aspirant to a GSoC Alumni
session_items.Speaker: Aditya Singh

session_items.Title: Break - Networking
session_items.Description: Time to chat with other participants and mentors
session_items.Speaker: Community

session_items.Title: GSoC Chronicles & AI Innovation: A Personal Voyage
session_items.Description: Dive into the personal narrative of a GSoC alumnus in ‘GSoC Chronicles & AI Innovation: A Personal Voyage.’ This session offers a retrospective look at the transformative journey through Google Summer of Code, highlighting the pivotal experiences and lessons learned. Additionally, the talk will introduce an exciting new venture: the AI Query Bot project. Attendees will get a first-hand account of the project’s inception, its objectives, and the anticipated impact on the open-source community.
session_items.Speaker: Shiqi Mei

session_items.Title: TBD
session_items.Description: TBD
session_items.Speaker: Shubham Bhardawaj

session_items.Title: Final Notes
session_items.Description: Let's wrap up the summit!
session_items.Speaker: Rocketeers

session_items.Title: Welcome to Rocket.Chat GSOC Demo Day 2024!
session_items.Description: Let's welcome all participants, contributors and Mentor!
session_items.Speaker: Gabriel Engel/Rodrigo/Sing Li
Sayan Banerjee
session_items.Title: Graphical Guided RC Code Tours
session_items.Description: This project aims to smoothen out the on-boarding process of new contributors to Rocket.Chat. The huge size of Rocket.chat's codebase makes it a overwhelming task to understand and start contributing to it. We use the power of VsCode and its extension CodeTour to explain the most crucial parts of the codebase, motivating them to work towards Open-Source community. We also have circumvented one of the limitations of the Codetour extension, which is its incompatibility with ever-evolving codebases, by employing innovative methods.

session_items.Mentor: Sing Li, Shubham Bhardwaj, John Crisp
session_items.Title: Extended LLM Prompt Editor/Explorer
session_items.Speaker: Ashutosh Singh
session_items.Description: The project aims to develop a comprehensive prompt editor within Rocket.Chat, facilitating seamless interaction between users and open source language models (LLMs) such as Mistral, Llama 2, and Phi. Key objectives include enabling free-flowing conversations, robust conversation history management, and seamless prompt sharing across external applications. The initial focus will be on implementing this functionality within the Rocket.Chat Web App and Electron platform.

session_items.Speaker: Anjaneya Gupta
session_items.Title: GSoC Community Hub 2024
session_items.Description: The Ultimate Solution for Scalable Static Websites Full-Stack Functionality: Seamlessly integrate data from the serverless CMS when needed, or choose alternative data sources according to your project requirements. Enhanced Syntax - Tailored for an effortless experience for community creators.

session_items.Title: AI Emoji Embellisher
session_items.Speaker: Sandeep Pillai
session_items.Description: Text embellishment is a natural language generation problem that aims to enhance the lexical and syntactic complexity of a text while retaining the same semantic information and meaning. This is often achieved by incorporating emojis, punctuation, and additional details to make the text more interesting and engaging. This proposal delves into the implementation details of the Embellisher App for Rocket.Chat. This app will enable users to generate emojified / embellished text messages from plain text messages they enter in the message box using open-source LLMs. Upon generation, the user will be notified with an interactive message that only the sender can see.

session_items.Speaker: Abhi Patel
session_items.Title: Multiple file sharing in one message
session_items.Description: My project enhances file sharing functionality by allowing users to send multiple files in a single message, a significant improvement over the previous limitation of sharing only one file at a time. Users can easily add files they may have forgotten to include, and they can also remove files that were mistakenly selected.

session_items.Speaker: Akshun Kuthiala
session_items.Mentor: Guilherme Gazzo, Diego Sampaio, Rodrigo Nascimento
session_items.Title: API Documentation Generator
session_items.Description: API documentation plays a vital role in developers’ workflow, serving as an essential reference for software integration and development. However, challenges such as outdated or inconsistent documentation frequently hinder efficient utilization. To address this, the proposed project aims to implement automation for API documentation generation leveraging a suite of tools including API Extractor, Typescript, Swagger and OpenAPI specifications. This initiative seeks to streamline the documentation process, ensuring accuracy, consistency, and timeliness in API references, thus enhancing overall development productivity and efficacy.

session_items.Speaker: Aman Negi
session_items.Title: AI in-channel GIF Image Generator
session_items.Description: Imagine expressing yourself with GIFs that perfectly capture your ideas and emotions, all within the familiar Rocket.Chat interface. This innovative app takes GIF creation beyond simply searching for existing ones. It empowers you to generate entirely new GIFs based on your descriptive prompts! Here's what makes this app truly stand out: - Prompt-based Generation: Simply describe what you want the GIF to show, and the app uses an open-source text-to-GIF model to bring your vision to life! You can even easily integrate your own model for even more customization. - Seamless Workflow: Generated GIFs are readily available for use anywhere within Rocket.Chat. No need to switch applications or upload files – it's all integrated into your chat flow. - Don't Settle for the First Try: Not quite happy with the generated GIF? Simply regenerate it with a click for a better match to your needs. - Enhanced with NLP: Can't think of a perfect prompt? Use the prompt generation feature which uses LLM as NLP, leading to even better GIF generation results. - Profanity Filter: Maintain a professional environment with the NSFW content filtering feature, ensuring appropriate content creation. - Extensive History Management: This app goes beyond just storing the last ten creations which is standard for most RC Apps. Pagination allows you to view and access a much larger history of generated GIFs. This app, with its level of customization, built-in NLP features, and user-friendly design, becomes a powerful tool for anyone who wants to express themselves visually within their Rocket.Chat chats. It injects a whole new level of creativity and fun into your communication, making it a truly valuable addition to the platform.

session_items.Speaker: Hardik Bhatia
session_items.Title: AgileBot
session_items.Description: This project aims to enhance team productivity within agile environments by using a chatbot-based approach. By developing a chatbot that is customized to meet the needs of agile workflows, teams will be able to streamline communication, task management, and meeting coordination. This project will be implemented via the apps engine in Rocket.chat.

session_items.Speaker: Hunter Xia
session_items.Title: AI Query Bot
session_items.Description: The AI Query Bot project is a cutting-edge Rocket.Chat application designed to revolutionize information retrieval by leveraging a highly configurable Retrieval Augmented Generation (RAG) pipeline. This pipeline integrates advanced natural language processing (NLP) technologies to deliver precise and contextually relevant answers to user queries. Users can customize various components, including embedding/tokenizer engines, vector database search algorithms, re-ranking strategies, and the choice of open-source Large Language Models (LLMs) like Mistral, Llama, and Phi. This flexibility ensures the bot can be tailored to meet specific needs and domains effectively.

session_items.Speaker: Jeffrey Yu
session_items.Title: Rocket.Chat AI Chat Summarizer
session_items.Description: This project aims to deliver a Rocket.Chat App that uses generative AI to summarize any conversations across threads, channels, and DMs. For example, a user can say, 'summarize my unread messages yesterday in the #engineering channel'. The users can ask AI any questions regarding the messages, and subscribe to personal digests that summarize selected channels on a recurring schedule. The AI summarizer will boost the productivity of Rocket.Chat users with faster information digest, and improve community engagement by keeping everyone on the same page.

session_items.Speaker: Maria Khelli
session_items.Mentor: Sing Li, Douglas Gubert, Devanshu Sharma
session_items.Title: Smart Scheduling App Assistant
session_items.Description: Setting a calendar event is a small, but important process in our day-to-day job. It can take some of your time when you want to set up another meeting if you 1) Already have a tight schedule; 2) Your coworkers are in different time zones; and 3) Have to switch back and forth between the calendar and the messaging app. Hence, this project aims to streamline the process using a scheduling assistant, that can create meetings or set up a reminder using a prompt. The solution will involve a lot of large language models (LLM) experiments for the user prompt. Therefore, this project can act as a semi-research in which the result of LLM experiments can be used to approach similar cases.

session_items.Speaker: Prisha Gupta
session_items.Title: Ai assistant for rocket chat main repository
session_items.Description: An Al-Assistant is developed to help developers understand the Rocket.Chat codebase better. This tool uses the existing knowledge base of the code to answer questions about the code structure and logic. It can answer specific questions about the code, create diagrams to explain things clearer, find relevant documentation, and even suggest ways to improve the code. This will help new developers learn the code faster and make the codebase overall better quality, easier to maintain, and more consistent.

session_items.Speaker: Ryan Zhou
session_items.Title: AI Programmer
session_items.Description: This is an AI bot to help you automatically generate code pieces. A Rocket.Chat app that enables the AI programmer functionalities where users can utilize the tool to create a short piece of code in C/C++, Java, Javascript, Typescript or Python based on specification supplied by the user. This implementation includes modern open source LLMs (Mistral, CodeLlama, WizardCode, Llama2, Phi, and so on) for a simplified configuration. This functionality also allows users to ask for a new variation of the code or augment/fine-tune the system for a more precise code generation. To achieve this, we propose to design a more intuitive and interactive UX to simplify users’ interaction. Finally, we will explore to bridge the generated codes with sharing APIs, allowing them to be shared to external applications and added to GitHub as a pull request. The AI Programmer app will be published on Rocket.Chat Marketplace together with specified documentation.

session_items.Speaker: Umang Utkarsh
session_items.Title: News Aggregation App
session_items.Description: The News Aggregation Rocket.Chat App is designed to deliver the latest news from various sources directly within the Rocket.Chat platform. This project aims to create an application that aggregates news from top websites like TechCrunch and BBC News, utilizing APIs or RSS feeds to collect data. The app will present news in a user-friendly format with complete configurability of sources and categories, ensuring users can customize their news feed according to their preferences. The project will implement logic to collect news, categorize it, and present it effectively within the platform. By enhancing the Rocket.Chat ecosystem, this app aims to offer users a seamless way to stay updated with curated news content without leaving the chat environment.

session_items.Speaker: Vipin Chaudhary
session_items.Title: Quick Replies
session_items.Description: Quick replies offers a convenient way to send standard responses swiftly, that can work as a pre-written message. Users can effortlessly create, edit, delete, and save a list of these quick replies, leveraging AI to generate responses tailored to their needs.

session_items.Speaker: Zishan Ahmad
session_items.Title: EmbeddedChat
session_items.Description: EmbeddedChat integrates a full-featured chat interface into your app, connected to the Rocket.Chat server, offering easy setup and cool features, including: 1. Flexible Configuration: Adjust the chat window’s size, appearance, and functionality. 2. Extensible Design: Customize the chat’s look with theming options to match your app’s branding. 3. Robust Authentication: Supports various login methods and secure cookie options for auto-login. 4. Real-Time Layout Editing: The ‘layout-editor’ tool allows users to design and customize EmbeddedChat layouts in real-time using drag-and-drop functionality. It also generates a theme object for easy setup.

session_items.Title: AI Newsletter Generator and Publisher
session_items.Speaker: Yuriko Kikuchi
session_items.Description: This Rocket.Chat app leverages modern open source LLMs (Mistral, Llama2, Phi, and so on) to help generate newsletters for special interest groups and/or teams operating on a Rocket.Chat server. The newsletter author should be able to supply raw content to the AI generator and have perfectly phrased and formatted newsletter generated. The app should allow for the immediate or scheduled publication of the resulting newsletter to either a team, subset of the server's user, or all of the server's users. The app should also allow for emailing those who prefers to receive the newsletter via email. Ideally the app should maintain a list of dynamically changing newsletter subscribers.
